Title: Fast Five
Overview: Former cop Brian O'Conner partners with ex-con Dom Toretto on the opposite side of the law. Since Brian and Mia Toretto broke Dom out of custody, they've blown across many borders to elude authorities. Now backed into a corner in Rio de Janeiro, they must pull one last job in order to gain their freedom.
Keywords: brazil, fbi, freedom, escape from prison, car crash, heist, organized crime, on the run, money, fugitive, police chase, escaped convict, car, imax, automobile racing, duringcreditsstinger
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Original Film, One Race Productions
Cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Jordana Brewster
